t: Amazon.com: Emotiva Audio Multi-Zone Power Amplifier Home Audio/Video Product Black (A-800) : Electronics
s: I'm one of those audiophiles that needs to do it on a budget, so the Emotiva was the choice. The first amp (the 150) arrived DOA. A wire had come loose, but that was corrected. It quickly became apparent I needed more power, so I ordered the A-300. The a-300 sounded good, but after only a few weeks it just died. I sent it and the pre-amp back and ended up buying another brand...
